original_text: So I was great, and increased more than all that were before me in Jerusalem: also my wisdom remained with me.
korean_text: 내가 이같이 창성하여 나보다 먼저 예루살렘에 있던 모든 자들보다 더 창성하니 내 지혜도 내게 여전하도다

sentences.original_text: and increased more than all that were before me
sentences.korean_translation: 나보다 먼저 있던 모든 사람들보다 더 증가했습니다

sentences.original_text: also my wisdom remained with me
